title: Thoma Bravo Nears Deal for Call Center Software Maker Verint Systems
summary: Buyout firm Thoma Bravo is nearing a deal to acquire call center software maker Verint Systems Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.

title: Galaxy, Jump, Multicoin Seek $1 Billion for Buying Solana Token
summary: Galaxy Digital, Multicoin Capital and Jump Crypto are in talks with potential backers about raising roughly $1 billion to accumulate Solana, in what would be the largest treasury dedicated to the digital token.

title: A Chinese E-Commerce Glut Is Meeting Resistance in Latin America
summary: The region is starting to tax the flood of cheap stuff from its lopsided trade partner.

title: Trump Threatens NBC, ABC Licenses Over News Coverage
summary: US President Donald Trump berated NBC and ABC as “two of the worst and most biased networks in history,” adding he’d support the FCC in revoking licenses to their television stations.

title: Terumo Buying Organ Tech Provider OrganOx for $1.5 Billion
summary: Terumo Corp. has agreed to buy UK-based organ medical tech company OrganOx Ltd. in a deal valued at around $1.5 billion, seeking entry into the organ transplant field.
